&nbsp;임베디드 소프트웨어 개발, 웹 애플리케이션 프론트엔드/백엔드,:
I have built extensive technical capabilities through various project experiences including embedded software development, web application frontend/backend, Windows applications, and machine learning. My main technology stack includes C#, Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, ASP.NET, WPF, MSSQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Docker, and I actively utilize C/C++ as needed.

 Outside of work hours, I continuously improve my technical proficiency through personal toy projects, experimenting with new technologies and applying the latest techniques. Through this process, I broaden my knowledge base and strengthen problem-solving abilities by acquiring technology stacks not used in my current work.

 I have particularly rich project experience in the steel manufacturing industry and possess deep domain knowledge of manufacturing processes. Additionally, based on years of experience as a field engineer in domestic and international manufacturing sites, including facility construction, project leading, and customer communication, I have a high understanding of both software department and service engineering department operations.

 With the goal of "To make your life easier!", I always strive to develop while considering how to provide more convenient and valuable solutions to users.
